bug.author: kparichay
bug.summary: Subplugin detects tensorflow even when its disabled
bug.description: CAPI unittest nnstreamer_capi_singleshot.unavailable_fw_tf_n fails when running this unit-test without enabling tensorflow. This is because the subplugin returns that tensorflow is available (although it is disabled). This bug can be replicated by building nnstreamer on ubuntu with meson with additional flag of -Denable-capi and testing build/tests/tizen_capi/unittest_tizen_capi.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2107>#2107</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
This was the mistake in my paths.
